Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): gains losses on extinguishment of debt

Other Operating Expenses: business combination integration and separation related costs
restructuring and asset related charges net
restructuring and related cost incurred cost

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share

__unmapped__: discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per basic share
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per diluted share
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
